content: I don't have personal preferences like humans do, but i can suggest some traditional virginia foods that you may want to try while visiting the university of virginia. virginia is known for its southern-style cuisine, and some of the most popular dishes include fried chicken, biscuits with gravy, bbq ribs, and collard greens. other popular regional foods to try include she-crab soup, virginia ham, peanut soup, and oysters rockefeller. the charlottesville area is also home to many local farms and wineries that offer fresh and locally sourced foods and drinks. you may want to check out the charlottesville city market, which is held on saturdays, where you can find a wide range of fresh produce, baked goods, meats, and other artisanal products. you may also want to visit nearby breweries and wineries to sample local craft beers and wines.
